thread.title: Allu Arjun to make an appearance at Kumari 21F audio launch
thread.title_full: Allu Arjun to make an appearance at Kumari 21F audio launch - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Allu Arjun to make an appearance at Kumari 21F audio launch
text: Young hero Raj Tarun's Kumari 21F has been the talk of the town ever since NTR unveiled the first teaser. Latest report is that the audio of this flick will be graced by stylish star Allu Arjun on the 31st of October in Hyderabad. Devi Sri Prasad is the music composer and Ratnavelu is the cinematographer. Directed by PalnatiSuryaPratap , the film has Heebah Patel as the female lead. Creative film maker Sukumar is the producer for the film. Currently, the post production works are going on at a brisk pace. The film is slated to hit the screens in November.
